name: format time HH:mm:ss
total mem - format units
disk use percent
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[0].capacity * 100.0
return msg;

name: used mem format units
load avg string
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.loadavg.join(', ')
return msg;

name: CPU model
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.cpus[0].model.replace(/^Intel[^ ]*\s+[^ ]* /i,"");
return msg;

name: cores
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.cpus.length;
return msg;

name: disk used bytes
disk size
varnish uptime (global)
func:
msg.payload = global.get("varnish_uptime")
return msg;

name: get hostname
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.hostname;
return msg;

name: function 1
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.memusage;
return msg;

name: vcache version
func:
msg.payload = env.get("VCACHE_VERSION") || '0.0.0';
return msg;

name: client requests
upstream requests
request ratio
upstream response bytes
client response bytes
bw ratio
bytes saved
bw saved
bw saved max
reset max
units metric
units metric
units metric
units metric
units metric
units metric
bytes to bits
func:
msg.payload = msg.rate*8.0
return msg;

name: bytes to bits
func:
msg.payload = msg.rate*8.0
return msg;

name: rate to payload
func:
msg.payload = msg.rate
return msg;

name: rate to payload
func:
msg.payload = msg.rate
return msg;

format:
<style>
    .def p.value {
        color: #4a8ad9;
    }
    .big p.value {
        vertical-align: bottom;
        font-size: 150%;
        color: #4a8ad9;
    }
    .big p.label {
        vertical-align: top;
        font-weight: bold;
    }
    .huge p.value {
        vertical-align: bottom;
        font-size: 200%;
        color: #4a8ad9;
    }
    .huge p.label {
        vertical-align: top;
        font-weight: bold;
    }
</style>

name: active connections
connections max
varnish uptime
global functions
